# Hari Krishna - Student Developer Portfolio

## About
Hari krishna is a Student Developer and Creative Coder based in Bhubaneswar, India. He specializes in Full-Stack Web Development, primarily using the React and Next.js ecosystem.

## Skills
- **Languages**: JavaScript, TypeScript, Python, Java, C/C++, SQL
- **Frameworks**: Next.js, React, Express.js, Tailwind CSS
- **Tools**: Git, GitHub, Vercel, Firebase, MongoDB

## Projects
- **Portfolio**: This website, showcasing his work and skills.
- **Various Open Source Experiments**: Available on GitHub.

## Contact
- **Email**: harikrishnx07@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/harikrishna0315
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hari-krishna-2393a633a/


## Content Structure
- `/`: Main landing page with Hero, About, Skills, Experience, Projects, and Contact sections.
- `/resume`: Direct link to view/download resume.
